name: Lazy Afternoon Hidden Objects Volume 1
description:

FREE UPGRADES!!

Early Release Notice: The price of the game will increase each time new scenes are added. Those who purchase the game early at the lower prices will have access to all new scenes and features at no additional cost.

Lazy Afternoon Hidden Objects Volume 1 is a relaxing early release game with a total of 5-50 various hidden object scenes for all ages. It offers special features that include, but are not limited to:

  • Hint system with optional shadows.
  • Text to Speech that will sound out the word in the word list.

Future releases from Lazy Afternoon Hidden Objects may offer features such as:

  • 5 new scenes added to the list (price increase each time scenes are added).
  • Scoring system with a scoreboard.
  • Unique scenes with their own theme.
  • Finished product will have a minimum of 50 unique scenes.

These games are designed to allow any age group the ability to enjoy the game and possibly even help children learn words or help those learning English. Lazy Afternoon Games is also looking for all input and any suggestions to improve the games. Please help improve this project by filling out a short survey at Survey Planet which will only take 1-2 minutes.

Thank you for your early purchase of this game and we hope you enjoy all future releases!
